import React from 'react'; import AnimeCard from '../AnimeCard'; const panels = document.querySelectorAll('.panel') function toggleOpen() { this.classList.toggle('open') } function toggleActive(e) { if (e.propertyName.includes('flex')) { // 'includes' from js. this.classList.toggle('open-active') } } panels.forEach((panel) => panel.addEventListener('click', toggleOpen)) panels.forEach((panel) => panel.addEventListener('transitionend', toggleActive)) // widens the flex panel. function Gallery(props) { // ! pass down props. return (
